title: Refugees on hope, Tokyo 2020, and dreaming big
description:
Coronavirus has meant families have spent months apart. These three IOC Refugee Athlete Scholarship-Holders have spent years without seeing their loved ones

To celebrate World Refugee Day, Tokyo 2020 hopefuls Yonas Kinde, Abdullah Sediqui, and 'Taking Refuge' athlete Khaoula share their reasons why sport has helped them through the tough times.

Head to OlympicChannel.com/Podcast for more episodes
